guide: Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
For this you just need to mine blocks,
complete Mining Commissions and collect
occasional Commission Milestones.
To gain passively progress in this
you should have a pet equipped at all times.
Don't forget to use pet items that boost
their XP-gain. Things like Milestone Rewards
(Commission, Garden, Bestiary Milestones)
and Pet Candies will be a good help here.
Ideally you'd want Ender Set
with a Void Sword for this.
This needs Combat 15 and a completion
of the 2 previous floors to enter.
To efficiently grind this, you should
get help from Party Finder/Friends.
Look for mobs with a purple name
and kill it.
You will get this from leveling up
skills for the Skill Average goal.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)

note: Apply the Rare Diamond Reforge Stone
guide: Mine Diamonds in the Deep Caverns until
you get a Rare Diamond to apply.
A safe spot to do this is between the Diamond Reserve
and the Obsidian Sanctuary (-20 27 70).
Mobs don't spawn there.
Kill Endermen in The End/your Private Island
to unlock Enderman Minions. Craft as many
as you can and place them on your island.
Give them the best fuel and storage
that you have access to and collect in time.
Talk to Jax in the Hub
under the Weaponsmith
and complete on of his challenges.
You should buy an Artisanal Shortbow
for this.
The easiest pet to go for is the Bingo Pet (5.6m xp)
Make sure you have your pet active and remember
to put a skill xp boost pet item on it.
You can buy those from Zog in the Hub
Daily Experimentation Table, Mining Commissions
and Milestones aswell as Garden (Crop) Milestones
are strong xp sources.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress.
Don't forget to talk to Bramass Beastslayer
in the Spiders Den to unlock /be.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Forage in the Hub for this.
Place as many minions as you can
give them a medium storage and the best fuel
you can. Collect them in time.
For this you will need Combat 12 and 600k.
Buy it from the Shop on the right hand
of the End Island Spawn.
List of more than 12 talismans:
Buy all 6 Talismans from the Adventurer in The Hub (26k)
Collection Talismans:
Farming Talisman, Vaccine Talisman,
Gravity Talisman, Talisman of Coins, Magnetic Talisman,
Wood Affinity Talisman, Speed Talisman, Potion Affinity Talisman
Other:
Archaeologists Compass, Mediocre Ring of Love, King Talisman,
Campfire Initiate Badge, Cat Talisman, Spider Talisman,
Don't forget to take the 4 Bonus accessory bag slots from
the Redstone Miner, he needs 1920 Redstone in total.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You can also kill Endermen in The End to
get progress towards the
Lucky Looter Community Goal.
Brew a potion with an Enchanted Sugar Cane/
Enchanted Gold (Block)/Enchanted Sugar (Cane)
and add Glowstone to it. You can get that Glowstone
by buying one block from the Builder and
breaking it on your island.
§fNo eggs:
Dolphin, Bee, Grandma Wolf, Bingo, Rock, Owl,
Enderman, Tarantula and Oringo pets
§fEggs needed:
Jerry, Rabbit, Pig, Chicken, Bat, Silverfish
To get the Enchanted Eggs needed, kill Chickens
in The Barn till you get the Chicken Head recipe.
Once you get your first Enchanted Egg, put it into
one Chicken Minion to generate more of those over time.
Talk to Guildford in the Dungeon Hub
and complete 4/4 objectives for 2 races.
Don't forget to talk to Guildford
after each run you do.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Use the Enchanted Sugar that you may get from
pests/the Garden to brew Speed Potions.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5), preferably Ender Armor
while you're in The End or Mushroom Armor
during the night.
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
If you still struggle, reforge your
armor to Titanic.
This unlocks at 2.5k Raw Porkchop Collection
and requires 40 Enchanted Pork to make.
You can use Minions for this and/or pair
it with the Exterminator Grind if you do
that in Barn.
You should either kill Endermen in
End using your Void Sword (200k) and
Ender Armor for this (buy the Ender Training
Perk from Tyzzo next to the Draconic Altar)
or Spiders in the Spiders Den with a Cleave 5
weapon. You might want to also use the free
Combat XP from Bestiary Miletones for this.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom and Cactus Armor.
Kill Skeletons in The Deep Caverns
to unlock Skeleton Minions. Craft as many
as you can and place them on your island.
Give them the best fuel and storage
that you have access to and collect in time.
Don't forget to buy your daily bones from
The Adventurer in The Hub.
Recommended for this is Zombie Slayer.
This needs 15 xp, so 3 t1 bosses.
Don't forget to claim the rewards
from Maddox.
